subject: order SSN6076 status
description_text:
Hello,

When will the order # SSN6076 will be shipped?
It as been 5 days already and the order did not shipped

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Maroiu,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hello,

If it is swnd from china instead of Germany, doesnt that means that i have
to PAY extra taxes? I prefer to be shipped from Germany if it is possible,
even it is a delay

Thanks

Hi Alex Maroiu,  â€‹We do not ship directly from China to your country. Instead, we ship in bulk to our warehouse in Germany, and then the German warehouse ships to your country. Therefore, there are no additional taxes. You don't need to worry.
Thank you for clarifications and support. Have a nice day!
Hi Alex Maroiu,  Have a nice day! too.Thank you for your purchase. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
